name: outro
commands: Guys, look.|That pillar's got all sorts of strange symbols on it.
It's got a strange tome sitting on it.|Do you think this is the cause of the events here?
Hmm...interesting|Very interesting.|By the looks of it, it seems that this tome here was the catalyst for the events that happened here.
What do you mean by catalyst?
This tome feeds off the intent of others.|It can cause the malice in people to rise thereby creating chaos.|Take a look of the old Lord's body, it's got the marks of battle.
So what you're saying is that there used to infighting.
Back then, there was a lot of power struggles here.|Greshia back then was known as THE trading hub. Thousands of gold was changed hands by the hour.
That's terrible! For the influence, they turned to...

Yes...|Perhaps by the time they realized it, it was already too late.|They tried to contain it, that's why this pillar is here.|However...they didn't have a light user.|MC here, take this tome with you.

Yes, you.|You can use light magic so you're resistant to its malice.|This tome will be quite the boon for you. It can pack quite the punch.|Want it? If not, I'll safeguard it to prevent further incidents.|Take some time to think about it while I examine this pillar further.
Hey...I don't fully understand this magic but...|All this talk about corruption and conflict...|This sounds like a terrible thing to have with us.
I agree with Senya.|It's caused this whole place to ruins.|Even if you're resistant, you're not immune.
But what if the power can help us defeat that necromancer?
I don't think it's worth the risk.|It's not that we don't want to defeat the mage...|it's just that we're worried and your safety should come first.
We don't know anything else about this tome.|It might be powerful, but it's more trouble than its worth.
Senya and Schuri didn't like that you took the tome (-1 both)
I think it's worth the risk. We can use the power to defeat that necromancer.|They're stronger than Teach, so any help would be beneficial.
MC...|Alright I can't say I'm happy about your decision, but...|I'll trust you.
Don't make us worry, got it?
Senya and Schuri liked that you didn't take the tome (+1 both)
This tome will be in a better place with you, Sir.
Alright, that take cares of that.
Oh thank the Spirits, for a split second I thought that creepy book would have to come with us.
That's a relief! There's no need for such a risk.
Hey! Let's head back to town now. Best not to linger here.|Who knows what else might be hiding here.
